bibl.title: A Portrait Mummy in Blackburn.
bibl.note: Blackburn Museum and Art Gallery, from Petrie's excavations at Hawara, 1888-9. - The Mummy. - The Footcase. - The Portrait. - Dating. From the late first to the early second century AD.

bibl.title: Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt

bibl.seg: SCOTT Pamela, A Portrait Mummy in Blackburn.
Morris L. BIERBRIER (Ed.), Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt (London, 1997) pp. 55-58, 1 fig. et pl. 6, 1-2.
Blackburn Museum and Art Gallery, from Petrie's excavations at Hawara, 1888-9. - The Mummy. - The Footcase. - The Portrait. - Dating. From the late first to the early second century AD.
